subject: Your monthly statement is ready
snippet: Statement balance $1,245.87 due Oct 25. Make a payment to avoid late fees.
body: Hi Akshay, your American Express Platinum statement is ready. Minimum payment due is $85.17. View the full statement and schedule your payment from the Amex app.

subject: Your order of smart lights has shipped
snippet: Order #114-88321 placed on Oct 18 has shipped. Track your package arriving Friday.
body: Thanks for shopping with Amazon. Your purchase total was $59.99 for Philips Hue Smart Bulbs. View tracking and manage delivery preferences in your orders dashboard.

subject: Upcoming flight to Seattle – itinerary details
snippet: Flight DL2345 departing SFO 7:05 AM, arriving SEA 9:15 AM. Check in opens 24 hours prior.
body: Hello Akshay, your Delta flight confirmation includes seat 14A, boarding group 2. Review hotel and rideshare options in the Fly Delta app.

subject: Agenda: Growth squad weekly sync
snippet: Reminder: project status review tomorrow at 2:00 PM. Join via Google Meet.
body: Team, please add your updates to the Notion page ahead of tomorrow's status meeting. We'll cover roadmap milestones, blockers, and hiring updates.

subject: Dinner on Saturday?
snippet: Hey! Are you free for dinner with the family this weekend?
body: Hi beta, we're planning a small family dinner on Saturday evening around 7. Let me know if you and Priya can join. Would love to catch up!

subject: Security alert: new sign-in detected
snippet: We noticed a login to your Coinbase account from a new device in San Francisco.
body: If this was you, you can disregard this message. Otherwise, secure your account immediately and review recent activity. Two-factor authentication is recommended.

subject: Your ride with Taylor – receipt
snippet: Thanks for riding with Lyft. Total charged $18.21 ending in 4242.
body: Trip summary: pickup Market Street, drop-off Folsom Street. Subtotal $17.02, taxes & fees $1.19. View detailed receipt in your account.

subject: Presale: ODESZA live in Oakland
snippet: Exclusive fan presale starts tomorrow at 10 AM PT. Use code WAVE to unlock seats.
body: ODESZA is coming back to the Bay. Presale tickets go live tomorrow. Set a reminder and secure floor seats before the general sale.

subject: Your order from Swiggy is ready. Thanks for making a payment of 2500.00 Dollars
snippet: Your order #123456 is ready for pickup at Swiggy.
body: Your order from Swiggy is ready for pickup. Thank you for choosing us! The bill amount you paid is 2500.00 Dollars

subject: Your skydiving session is confirmed
snippet: Your skydiving session is confirmed for tomorrow at 10:00 AM.
body: Your skydiving session is confirmed for tomorrow at 10:00 AM. Thank you for choosing us! The bill amount you paid is 600 Dollars
